doc.title: 冰雪奇缘的故事：打造迪斯尼动画经典
doc.body: A behind-the-scenes look at "Frozen" (2013), the Academy Award winner for Best Animated Feature, includes interviews with voice-cast members Kristen Bell and Idina Menzel and the creative team who adapted Hans Christian Andersen's story "The Snow Queen"; and visits to the actual villages and landscapes that inspired the fictional kingdom of Arendelle. Also: "Frozen" characters on "Once Upon a Time"; a preview of "Big Hero 6."
